|cpu1chip1 = Lantiq;PXB 4387;(GRX387); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 34Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 600 <!-- 500 MHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Quantenna;QT3840BC; |cpu2_cores = 2 |cpu2_type = ARC |cpu2_type_rev = 700 |cpu2spd = 500 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A8:D3:F7 |oui = A8:D3:F7
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32.42;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/05/2015 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Lantiq;PSB 82312;(WRX312); |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Quantenna;QT3840BC; |rad2chip2 = Quantenna;QT2518B; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== aka '''o2 HomeBox 6441''' (Mat.-Nr. 101542) by ''Telefónica Deutschland Holding AG''
The [[Arcadyan]] PCB ID "P/N: 141951820008J R01A." is silkscreened on the main board.
;Arcadyan IDs FWVersion 1.01.31 build18 (see: 192.168.1.1/wz_dsl.htm)
==Links of Interest== *[https://github.com/christianheyl/HomeBox6441 GPL OpenWrt package from Arcadyan (Version: 1.01.30)] *[https://github.com/christianheyl/Quantenna-GPL GPL Quantenna (WiSoC) from opensource@arcadyan.com] *[http://www.astorianetworks.com/astoria/source/O2%20HomeBox%206441%20CE%20DoC%20in%20English%20version_2017%20RED%20Renew.pdf EU Declaration of Conformity (DoC)] *[http://www.astorianetworks.com/astoria/source/Kurzanleitung_o2_HomeBox_6441_v4.0_deutsch-online.pdf Quick Start Guide v4.0 (German)] *[http://www.astorianetworks.com/astoria/source/Kurzanleitung_o2_HomeBox_6441_v30_english.pdf Quick Start Guide] *[http://www.astorianetworks.com/astoria/source/Handbuch_o2_HomeBox_6441_v1.4.pdf Manual (German)] *[http://www.astorianetworks.com/astoria/source/HomeBox_6441_EULA.pdf EULA]

WiFi 5G Co Processor: (Quantenna) * bridge-utils 1.0.6 * busybox 1.10.3 * fakeroot 1.9.5 * iproute2 2.6.35 * linux-kernel 2.6.35.12 * mtd_20050122.orig * openssl 0.9.8zc * u-boot 2009.06 * uClibc 0.9.28.3 * wireless-tools 29 * wpa_supplicant 1.1 * zhostapd-hostapd git * dhcp 4.1 ESV R3 * php 5.0.5 * libbcmath * libmbfl * jittertest * TSRM * Zend * oniguruma * pcrelib * zlib 1.2.3 * portmap_5beta * mini_httpd 1.19 * qcsapi 1.0.1 }}
===Labels=== <small> The label on the xDSL-CPE has [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Code_128 Code 128] barcodes with serial id :(one letter and 9 digits) and mac address.
o2 HomeBox 6441 AStoria Mat.-Nr.: 101542 networks xxxxxxxxbarcodexxxxxxxx PN: VRV9518SWAC24-B-49 Serial Number: D5100xxxxx Netzteil: 12V = 2,5A SSID: o2-WANxx WPA2-Schlüssel: xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx CE xxxxxxxxbarcodexxxxxxxx MM/YY: 10/15 MAC-Adresse: A8D3F7xxxxxx Made in China
There are barcode labels on the pcb in [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Code_39 Code 39] with the serial id :(one letter and 9 digits) and the mac address. The DECT Radio Fixed Part Identity (RFPI) of this device is noted.
xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxbarcodexxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Serial Number: D5100xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxbarcodexxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx MAC ID: A8D3F7xxxxxx NWV499518001J 08 RFPI: 02C9B20Fxx
You can read "G5080454110481" in Code 128 on a pcb label. The full text is:
G5080454110481 VRV9518SWAC24-B-49 SJ
The Flash at position U17 is labeled
VRV9518SWAC24-B U17 -49 MAIN V1.01.23 D3F9 </small>
==See also== *[[Arcadyan]] VRV9510RWAC34 • [[ASUS DSL-AC87VG]] ([[Quantenna]]) *[[Arcadyan VRV7006AW22-A-GR]] • [[Arcadyan]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/start ''OpenWrt Wiki''] *[[Arcadyan ARV7506PW11]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv7506 '''o2 Box 4421'''] (Alice IAD 4421) *[[Arcadyan VGV7510KW22]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/vgv7510kw22 '''o2 HomeBox 6431'''] (VRX288) *[[Arcadyan VRV9518SWAC24-B-49]] • '''o2 HomeBox 6441''' *[[ZyXEL VMG7947-B40A]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/zyxel_vmg7947-b40a_o2_homebox_6641_de01v2f '''o2 HomeBox 6641'''] (DE01V2F) *[[ZyXEL C1000Z]] • [[ZyXEL C2100Z]] (FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/I88C2100Z I88C2100Z]) :[[ZyXEL VMG4825-B10A]] • [[ZyXEL VMG9823-B10A]]
